attributes.action: Allow beauty salons to start treatments on face, eyebrows and eyelashes
attributes.additional_details: Allow beauty salons to reopen with measures in place. Bearing in mind you can go into a pub or restaurant with complete strangers and no masks but you cannot get your treatments to your face with multiple safety measures in place.
attributes.background: Allow beauty salons to start treatments on face, including eyebrows and eyelashes with the correct measures in place such as masks, and visors. This is now starting to affect people's livelihood with the chance they will not be able to re-open due to loss of earnings.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331169
